Posts.Content: What state are you in ? 50 years old. Braca Positive. I am from NJ and let me tell you I was stage 2 in the left breast and 11 Lymph nodes on the left my Oconlogist went full force I had 30 weeks of Chemo treatments prior to my Double Mastectomy and 20 weeks after then I had 37 radiation treatments now I am cancer FREE... My DR. was very aggressive... And I am very happy with my DR.  a nightmare going through it all but well worth it....  Now i am just waiting for my skin to heal to have my reconstruction !
Posts.Title: Double Mastectomy Confusion
